QuestData.Title: The Spirits Have Voices
QuestData.Description: $n, now that you can see me, there is something you must tell Rexxar. I know that he seeks his people, and I know where they are.$B$BThe Mok'Nathal, as they are known, have a village to the east beyond the Razor Ridge.$B$BGo, give Rexxar this news. His people are in danger, and I know that he will want to come to their aid.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Rexxar at Thunderlord Stronghold in the Blade's Edge Mountains.
QuestData.RewardText: What is this you speak of?$B$BGarm Wolfbrother? He was the last chieftain of the Thunderlord clan. If you have communed with his spirit, then it must be true.
